thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Mar 22

author: Reuters Editorial
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Mar 22

locations.name: central bank of the republic of turkey

organizations.name: kuala lumpur - central bank of malaysia
general news events index of all diaries guide to economic indicators

text:
Jan 20 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top Economic Events
Government Debt Auctions
Political and General News Events
Index of All Diaries
Guide to Economic Indicators This Diary is filed daily. ** Indicates new events, if any
MONDAY, JANUARY 22 ** ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria holds monetary policy meeting (to Jan 23).
TUESDAY, JANUARY 23 BANGKOK - Thai central bank governor Veerathai Santiprabhob speaks at a seminar on capital market outlook, as the Thai stock market is hitting all-time highs this year on continued foreign fund inflows. - 0600 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, JANUARY 24 TBILISI - National Bank of Georgia holds its monetary policy committee meeting.
THURSDAY, JANUARY 25 KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia announces interest rate decision. ANKARA - Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey releases minutes of its January monetary policy committee meeting. KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting.
TUESDAY, JANUARY 30 ** PRAGUE, Czech Republic - Czech National Bank vice-governor Mojmir Hampl will speak on “Outlook for Interest Rates in Europe, Asia and the U.S.” at Asset and Risk Management Seminar Session III - 1300 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (No Interest rate announcement).
BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1300 GMT
SUNDAY, JANUARY 31 SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile holds monetary policy meeting (to Feb. 1).
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 1 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank holds monetary policy meeting. Statement and presentation will be published. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland releases the minutes of its monitory policy meeting.
TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 6 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) holds interest rate meeting - 0330 GMT. BRASILIA- Central Bank of Brazil holds monetary policy committee meeting (to Feb. 7). WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (to Feb. 7).
WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 7 ** TIRANA - Monetary Policy Statement of the Bank of Albania 2017 H2. NEW DELHI - Reserve Bank of India holds monetary policy committee meeting.
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 8 MANILA - Philippines Central Bank holds monetary policy meeting. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. MEXICO - Central Bank of Mexico publishes Monetary policy statement. SYDNEY - Speech by RBA Governor Philip Lowe at A50 Australian Economic Forum dinner, Sydney.
FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 9 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its February 2018 monetary policy meeting. SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia issues statement on monetary policy – 0030 GMT. MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia announces interest rate decision - 1030 GMT.
MONDAY, FEBRUARY 12 SYDNEY - Speech by Luci Ellis, RBA Assistant Governor (Economic) at ABE Forecasting conference, Sydney – 2030 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 14 JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds board of governors meeting. (to Feb 15). WINDHOEK - Central Bank of Namibia holds monetary policy meeting. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank holds monetary policy meeting. BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting. KAMPALA - Bank of Uganda announces interest rate decision. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its January 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1300 GMT.
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 15 CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt holds monetary policy committee meeting.
MONDAY, FEBRUARY 19 SYDNEY - Speech by Michele Bullock, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial System) at Responsible Lending and Borrowing Summit, Sydney – 2215 GMT.
TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 20 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of February Monetary Policy Meeting – 0030 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (no interest rate announcement).
THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 22 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland releases the minutes of its monitory policy meeting. MEXICO - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting. FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 23 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Payments System Board Meeting.
TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 27 SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds monetary policy meeting to announce interest rates.
** BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds rate-setting meeting - 1300 GMT.
THURSDAY, MARCH 1 ** KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting. TUESDAY, MARCH 6 ** WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (to March 7). ** SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia holds interest rate meeting – 0330 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 7 ** TBILISI - National Bank of Georgia holds monetary policy committee meeting. ** KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia announces interest rate decision.
THURSDAY, MARCH 8 ** BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 14 ** BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its February 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1300 GMT.
THURSDAY, MARCH 15 ** SWITZERLAND - Swiss National Bank (SNB) to assess monetary policy – 0830GMT.
MONDAY, MARCH 19 ** SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile holds monetary policy meeting (to March 20). ** ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria holds monetary policy meeting (to Mar 20).
TUESDAY, MARCH 20 ** BRASILIA- Central Bank of Brazil holds monetary policy committee meeting (to March 21). ** SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0030 GMT. ** RABAT - Bank of Morocco holds monetary policy meeting.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 21 ** JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds board of governors meeting. (to Mar 22).
THURSDAY, MARCH 22 ** MANILA - Philippines Central Bank holds monetary policy meeting.
